alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sampson and central Cumberland Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Godwin, or 9 miles east of Fayetteville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastover, Wade, Salemburg and Vander. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
